message: Hi,  We're looking for Django/python developer to join us at London 2012 Ceremonies.  There's a mix of front end work for mobile and web, integration with SMS and email gateways and physical security systems.  The job is currently posted in the Ceremonies area of london2012.com
Or feel free to contact me if you would like more information.
It's listed as a full time job between from now until the Olympics.  Also - working onsite in East London.  If you prefer contract, you could indicate that in any reply to the job advertisement.
